metadata.synopsis: Gizelle Flintsplitter, Refugee_12, can't stand her brother's wife.

0.speaker: Gizelle Flintsplitter
0.text: Can't figure out how Garron puts up with her. Maybe she treats him special in the sack - no, Gizelle! Don't think about it!

1.speaker: Gizelle Flintsplitter
1.text: Can't stand her can't stand her can't stand her! My sister-in-law: all law and no sister. Grr!
